roleset.name: prepare

example.name: all args
example.text: The camp is readying itself for battle.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'ready' based on the usage in ectb and comparison with 'prepare'; adjectival 'ready' based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls preparing-26.3-1

example.name: adjectival rel: ready
example.text: Perhaps it was a wrong thought in passing , perhaps it was an impulse , perhaps the factor of violence may already be ready to make trouble .
